summary: The vehicle is driving on an urban road. A person on a scooter is visible on the left side of the road. The road appears to be narrow with buildings on both sides. The vehicle maintains a steady speed. The person on the scooter is moving in the same direction as the vehicle.
actions: The self-driving vehicle is maintaining a steady speed on the urban road. The vehicle is likely maintaining its speed due to the clear road ahead and the absence of immediate obstacles. The vehicle is also keeping a safe distance from the person on the scooter on the left side of the road.
key_objects: 1) Left side: A person on a scooter, approximately 10 meters away, moving in the same direction as the vehicle.
